txt.en: Defeat the Orc who has Oda's tools

The Orc who stole Oda's tools retreated to Târ-kútoz, the Orc camp to the west of Ashmargathâl. However, Oda does not know which Orc is responsible.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs to see which one has her tools.

'One of those Orcs stole my tools! Supplies are scarce up here, and those are the only tools I've got to work with. But there's no way I can follow him into that camp; I'm just an armourer! Argh, I'll be damned if a single Orc ruins our soldiers' armour!\n\n'You're able to fight, aren't you? If you're going west into Târ-kútoz, could you help me find the culprit? I can't say I know which Orc took my tools, but if you find dwarf-made armourer's tools, those are mine.'
An Orc has stolen Oda's sole set of armourer's tools.
You have found Oda's tools.\n\nYou should return them to her at Ashmargathâl.
'Finally! I can continue working, the soldiers can get their armour repaired, and the Orcs can't lay their nasty hands on my tools. If you ever need your armour repaired, feel free to come to me!'
